main event: A bell-shaped craft, approximately 50 feet in diameter, was observed at Bunker Hill Air Force Base, Indiana, on the evening of 8 September 1959.
interesting points: The object was maneuverable and exhibited fast movements., Multiple civilians witnessed the object beneath it., A student pilot also reported seeing a similar object and thought it might be a balloon., The sighting was taken seriously, prompting further investigation by military officials., The object was not identified as an aircraft and generated significant public interest.
witness description: civilians and military personnel, including a student pilot and control tower operators
